front.title: Diet-ESP: a flexible and compressed format for IPsec/ESP

abstract.t: This document defines Diet-ESP that adapts IPsec/ESP for IoT. Diet- ESP compresses fields of the Standard ESP. The compression is defined by profiles based ROHC and ROHCoverIPsec as well as parameters mentioned in the Diet-ESP Context agreed between the two Diet-ESP peers for example using IKEv2.
